general:
```General```
**The Trevor Project (LGBTQ+ youth crisis intervention)**: https://thetrevorproject.org / 1-866-488-7386
**The Trevor Project's Coming Out Handbook (resources re: coming out)**: https://www.thetrevorproject.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Coming-Out-Handbook.pdf
**Gay, Lesbian & Straight Education Network (GLSEN) (information and resources)**: https://glsen.org
**National Suicide Prevention Lifeline (suicide hotline)**: https://suicidepreventionlifeline.org / 1-800-273-8255
**Crisis text hotline:** Text "home" to 741741
**Safe Schools Coalition (resources for LGBTQ+ youth re: education)**: http://safeschoolscoalition.org
**Q Chat Space (online community for LGBTQ+ teens)**: https://www.qchatspace.org

**National Center for Transgender Equality**: https://transequality.org
**Transgender Legal Defense & Education Fund**: https://www.transgenderlegal.org
**Trans Lifeline Hotline**: 877-565-8860
